verses.1: Zing ciang hun ading kima-sialh kei in. Tu hun le tua hun kikalah a piang ding thu bangmah na thei kei hi.
verses.2: Midangte in hong phat loh buang nangmah kiphattawm kei in. Khual mite in hong phat loh buang nangma kamin kiphattawm kei in.
verses.3: Suangtum le sehnel gik mahmah a, ahi zongin mihaiteʼ piansak lungkhamna gik zaw lai hi.
verses.4: Hehna le sinsona siahuai a, ahi zongin hazatna siahuai zaw lai hi.
verses.5: Itna i seel bawl sangin a langtangin taina hoih zaw hi.
verses.6: I lawmte in hong liamsak hangin i hoih nading a hong deihsakna hizaw hi. I galte in hong ngawng kawina pen hong leh bawlna ahi hi.
verses.7: A gilvah mipa in khuaizu nangawn duh nawn lo a, a gilkial mipa in a kha an nangawn lim sa hi.
verses.8: Inn panin gamlapi ah a zin khia mipa a bu panin a leeng khia vasa tawh kibang hi.
verses.9: Sathau namtui le paknamtui in lung nuamsak a, lawmteʼ limbawlna in tha hatsak hi.
verses.10: Na lawmte daang koih kei inla, na paʼ lawmte dong nangawn lawm bawl in. Na lungkham ciangin na sanggampa va ko kei in. A gamla ah a om i sanggampa sangin a nai ah a om i veengpa kimang zaw hi.
verses.11: Ka ta aw, pil in; tua hileh ka lungdam dinga, kei hong mawhsak nuamte in bangmah hong cih thei lo ding hi.
verses.12: Mipilte in a lauhuai thu mu thei-in pelh uh a, mi mawkmawkte in phusuakin thuak uh hi.
verses.13: Mi khat in gamdang mi khatʼ leiba a lohsak dingin kam a ciam leh a ciam bangin ama neihsa kilaksak takpi ding hi.
verses.14: Mi khat in a kituak lopi-in midang khat limbawl lualiang leh amah in a sia lamin na ngaihsun zaw hi.
verses.15: Phun bekbek a thei zi pen theu hun mel a nei lo guahciin tawh kibang hi.
verses.16: Tua bang numeite kikho thei lo a, a kikham thei lo huihnung le i khutin sathau i tawi nop tawh kibang hi.
verses.17: Sik in sik mah hiamsak thei a, mi in midang pilsak thei hi.
verses.18: Theikung a cing pa in a theigah ne a, a tapa a kem pa in pahtakna ngah hi.
verses.19: Tui sung en leeng eima maitang i muh bangin i lungsim en leeng eima pianzia kilang hi.
verses.20: Mihingteʼ lungsim pen misiteʼ gam tawh kibang a, tam lua cih hun nei thei lo hi.
verses.21: Ngun le khamte meikhuk ah kize-et a, mihing ahihleh phatna tawh kize-et hi.
verses.22: Mihai khat a sih dek dongin na satsat hangin a hai ngei mahin hai veve lai ding hi.
verses.23: Na tuuhonte hoihtakin thei inla, na bawnghonte hoihtakin kem in.
verses.24: Bang hang hiam cih leh neihsa kip tawntung lo a, hauhna pen a khangkhangin kizom suak lo hi.
verses.25: Lopate ki-at mangkhin a, ahi zongin a no hong selkik hi. Mual tungah a po lopa hing khempeuh ki-atin inn ah kipua a,
verses.26: tuute in na puan ding hong guan a, na keeltal mante lo ciing khat man tawh kikim hi.
verses.27: Na keelnawite ahihleh na innkuan annek ding, le na nasem numeiteʼ nuntak nadingin kicing ding hi.
